about.title: About me
about.p1: I help businesses grow safely. As a lawyer with experience building and securing applications and automations, I build custom software and workflows that solve bottlenecks while keeping you compliant with local and international regulations. From data security to digital infrastructure, I guide you through the complexities so you can focus on what matters.
about.p2: What have I built? A variety of things, from enterprise custom software to internal tools and e-commerce platforms. Markatzy, an AI-powered platform automating trademark monitoring and legal defence. Websites for businesses of all sizes, tailored to their needs with privacy and security at the core. At Kriptos, I worked as part of both the SOC and dev teams, delivering 37,000+ lines of production code. My toolkit? Legal expertise, experience working at the edge of what's possible with today's tech, a cybersecurity certification from UT Austin, software engineering and cybersecurity diplomas from BrainStation (Konrad Group), a financial accounting certificate from HBS Online, a cloud certification from AWS, ongoing training for CompTIA Security+, and an obsession with efficiency. Outside of work, I'm an explorer and the outdoorsy type. Long-distance running, volcano hikes, and easy days at the beach with my wife.
